body_html:
I see, you're assuming your targets to be 0/1, where as usually, people are using -1/+1 labels when speaking of the logistic loss.
Thanks for clarifying! Using that, I'm able to achieve the same test errors as with my naive log-sum-exp implementation.

Are you planning to add a robust log-sum-exp in the future?

body:
I see, you're assuming your targets to be 0/1, where as usually, people are using -1/+1 labels when speaking of the logistic loss.
Thanks for clarifying! Using that, I'm able to achieve the same test errors as with my naive log-sum-exp implementation.

Are you planning to add a robust log-sum-exp in the future?
